metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21417 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
fluidsynth is a software synthesizer based on the SoundFont 2 specifications. A use after free violation was discovered in fluidsynth, that can be triggered when loading an invalid SoundFont file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-21417` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fluidsynth - 2.2.8-1
libfluidsynth3 - 2.2.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fluidsynth package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.8-1').
